stimulusHtml: Which of the following most facilitated the rapid adoption of the printing press in Europe in the last half of the 1400s?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the printing press.

choicesHtml: Subsidies from new monarchs for the establishment of official government printing presses
Interest in new geographic discoveries being made by European explorers
Increases in literacy and decreases in the cost of paper
Demand for vernacular versions of the Christian Bible
